Feature Components.name: ProductSlider
Feature Components.description: Product carousel/slider with navigation controls. Displays product cards with image, title, description, and call-to-action button. Requires Swiper library.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all products. Items must be in their original condition with tags attached.

items.question: How long does shipping take?
items.answer: Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout.

Feature Components.name: SocialMediaFeed
Feature Components.description: Social media feed component displaying a gallery of social media posts with follow links. Uses Font Awesome icons for social platform badges.
